Label: Definition

Sentence: Hyperbaric oxygen therapy (HBOT) uses these conditions therapeutically to enhance oxygen delivery to tissues.
Label: Purpose

Sentence: It is also used to treat carbon monoxide poisoning, wound healing issues, and infections like gangrene.
Label: Addition

Sentence: The increased pressure allows oxygen to dissolve more in the blood, reaching areas with poor circulation.

Sentence: Despite its benefits, hyperbaric therapy must be administered carefully to avoid adverse effects.
Label: Emphasis
